title: The Sampler Kit
content: Try a variety of Haus flavors with our customizable four-bottle kit. Each bottle serves 2-3 drinks.

title: Grapefruit Jalapeño
content: Light and refreshing, this aperitif is a bright blend of citrus with a subtle kick of fresh jalapeño.

title: Citrus Flower
content: A fresh Californian take on the apéritif. Made with crisp lemon and subtle elderflower.
